name: Varina (Woot! 2018)
description:
Gina, the portuguese fishwife from the small village of Nazaré, is our heroine.

This game is about her secret story and her forbidden love for Libório, fisherman from the same town.

Help Gina, the fishwife, find the dried fish for her lover, Libório.

This is a demo version of Varina, specially made by ESPECTROTEAM for Woot! 2018. The original Varina was released as a covertape for Revista Espectro nº3. A 128K sequel may follow soon...

You can download the emulator .tap file.

Controls: q - Up   /   a - Down   /   o - Left   /   p - Right
